description:
>>Update<<
Now AD Free. Donate if you find it useful.

Recent Features are currently in English only & will be localized eventually. 
This application is a cost per unit calculator designed to save you money. It simplifies obtaining and comparing the unit cost of an item in four different quantities and provides detailed result information. It contains built-in unit conversion between common measurements in liquid, weight, and length.
Once you get the results, you can share them via email, SMS, or instant messaging! There is also a multiple percent discount calculator (work in progress) which has been updated to include sales tax if you wish. 
Also, based on feedback from the catalog, I have included the option to force English. 
If there are further improvements you wish to see (either in the program or the language translation) please leave feedback or contact me! 

You can easily find the best value while doing your shopping. 
* Update: Metrix and UI Tweaks.
* Update: added area conversions. 
* Minor bug fixes, UI tweaks and update notification (via puchk).
